mapper.insert: INSERT item ( user_no, state_code, item_name, price, item_info, regi_date, category1, category2 ) VALUES ( #{userNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stateCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate(), #{category1, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{category2, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: SELECT i.item_no, i.user_no, i.state_code, i.item_name, i.price, i.item_info, i.regi_date, i.category1, i.category2, l.grid_x1, l.grid_y1, l.grid_x2, l.grid_y2, l.grid_x3, l.grid_y3 FROM item i, location l WHERE i.item_no=l.item_no AND i.item_no=#{value}

SELECT item_no, user_no, state_code, item_name, price, item_info, regi_date, category1, category2, grid_x1, grid_y1, grid_x2, grid_y2, grid_x3, grid_y3 FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, @RNUM:=@RNUM+1 AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT i.item_no, i.user_no, i.state_code, i.item_name, i.price, i.item_info, i.regi_date, i.category1, i.category2, l.grid_x1, l.grid_y1, l.grid_x2, l.grid_y2, l.grid_x3, l.grid_y3 FROM item i, location l
i.item_no = l.item_no
AND item_name LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND price LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND state_code LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
ORDER BY item_no ) AS inner_table, ( SELECT @RNUM :=0 ) AS RNUM WHERE @RNUM<#{endRowNum} ) AS inner_table WHERE inner_table.row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.update:
UPDATE item
state_code=#{stateCode, jdbcType=INTEGER},
item_name=#{itemName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price=#{price, jdbcType=INTEGER},
item_info=#{itemInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category1=#{category1, jdbcType=INTEGER},
category2=#{category2, jdbcType=INTEGER}
WHERE item_no = #{itemNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}
